SEO.PageTitle: Rhea (RHEA) - Live streaming prices and market cap
SEO.PageDescription: Live Rhea prices from all markets and RHEA coin market Capitalization. Stay up to date with the latest Rhea price movements and forum discussion. Check out our snapshot charts and see when there is an opportunity to buy or sell.

General.DangerTop: RHEA Project has announced that RHEA and all of its assets will be acquired by an investment fund. As part of the agreement, there will be no further association between the founding team and the RHEA token project. Contributors will need to fill out a form on the website in order to begin the refund process.
General.Name: Rhea
General.Description: Reha is a crypto-equity hybrid token, allowing users to hedge against volatility by investing in the index rather than in one single asset. Through the Rhea Crypto20 - the capitalization-weighted index, there will be multiple ways of hedging, speculating and investing in the cryptocurrency market without holding any individual currency. RHEA is an ERC20 token based on the Ethereum blockchain. Rhea token will provide up to 40% quarterly dividends to all token holders.

ICO.Description:
Reha is a crypto-equity hybrid token, allowing users to hedge against volatility by investing in the index rather than in one single asset. Through the Rhea Crypto20 - the capitalization-weighted index, there will be multiple ways of hedging, speculating and investing in the cryptocurrency market without holding any individual currency. RHEA is an ERC20 token based on the Ethereum blockchain. Rhea token will provide up to 40% quarterly dividends to all token holders.

Team:

  • Detelin Sertov: Co-Founder 
  • Georgi Kirilov: Co-Founder 
  • Vesselin Antonov: Lead developer

The Rhea ICO will begin on the 2nd of October 2017 and will last until the 30th of the same month or until the 50000 ETH funding cap is reached. 85% of the total token supply will be sold during the ICO for a 0.0008145 ETH starting price.

Token Reserve Split:

  • 10% liquidity provision,
    4% long-term reserve,
    1% bounties

The Rhea ICO features a bounty and bonus campaign.

Bonus Structure:

Price Per Token
- Oct 2 - Oct 4
- Oct 5 - Oct 8
